review: Inspiring true story and ggreat for all ages. watched this at the Austin film festival. recommended !

title: Movie made with heart
review: Amazing movie, all aspects from story, acting, direction, cinematography,editing! There was a reality to this movie which keeps interest throughout. Plus it give a beautiful social message! So a win win situation for it. Apart from movies just made for fun, these kind of movies bring the real lover of cinema to the screens!

title: powerful for Sikhs and others
review: I had to download this app just to write my thoughts on this movie. My wife is a sikh and its true they are very much discriminated against. this movie shines light! glad its being told. great movie and must see.
